title: Batu caves
brief_description: A group of school children explores Batu Caves in Kuala Lumpur and discover interesting examples of Malayan wild life. Many varieties of bats are the chief inhabitants, while various insects, snails, crickets, centipedes, scorpions, white snakes and small crustaceans are also to be found. No other credits available.
